s2r2.animation - package s2r2.animation
This package provides animations for some objects and textures.
s2r2.geometry - package s2r2.geometry
This package provides basic geometric primitives and mathematical operations
s2r2.rendering - package s2r2.rendering
This package implements all rendering related classes
s2r2.scene - package s2r2.scene
This package implements scenes and all supported basic primitives
s2r2.sprites - package s2r2.sprites
This package provides sprites that can be rendered on top of the scene
s2r2.texture - package s2r2.texture
This package provides textures for primitives
s2r2.ui - package s2r2.ui
This package provides the user interface and an example scene
